message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on something really valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120.

I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer the product to you for $135. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really appreciate the value it brings.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $125 for the product.

I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I can offer the product to you for $130. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really get a lot of value out of it.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $122 for the product.

I understand you're really close to your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer the product to you for $128. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really get a lot of value out of it.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm really trying to stay within my budget. I'm willing to pay $120 for the product.
